name: Ragnaraika Tortoise Tyrant
text:
2+ Insect, Plant and/or Reptile monsters
You can banish up to 2 monsters from your GY, then target the same number of Spell/Traps your opponent controls; destroy them. If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 Insect, Plant or Reptile monster you control; place it on the bottom of the Deck, and if you do, Special Summon this card, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Insect, Plant or Reptile monsters. You can only use each effect of "Ragnaraika Tortoise Tyrant" once per turn.
